meanings.definition: A Norwegian cheese made from goat's milk.
meanings.sent1: I tried some gjetost at the Norwegian festival.
meanings.sent2: The gjetost melted perfectly on my toast.
meanings.sent3: The gjetost cheese was so tasty, it made me dance a little jig.
meanings.sent4: The gjetost was like a sweet hug from a goat.
meanings.sent5: The gjetost cheese had a creamy texture that I'll never forget.

meanings.definition: A sweet caramelized cheese with a brown color.
meanings.sent1: The gjetost had a rich, caramel flavor.
meanings.sent2: I spread gjetost on my crackers for a sweet treat.
meanings.sent3: The gjetost cheese looked like a tiny brown sun in the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as gjetost.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of gjetost filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A type of cheese with a unique flavor profile.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever tasted gjetost? It's unlike any other cheese.
meanings.sent2: The gjetost added a special touch to the cheese platter.
meanings.sent3: The gjetost cheese whispered secrets of its flavor to me.
meanings.sent4: The gjetost was a symphony of taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The gjetost cheese was a culinary adventure waiting to be explored.
